name: AVAssetWriterInputGroup
desc: A group of inputs with tracks that are mutually exclusive to each other for playback or processing.

items.name: init(inputs: [AVAssetWriterInput], defaultInput: AVAssetWriterInput?)
items.desc: Creates a group for the asset writer inputs.

items.name: var inputs: [AVAssetWriterInput]
items.desc: The inputs with tracks that are mutually exclusive to each other for playback or processing.

items.name: var defaultInput: AVAssetWriterInput?
items.desc: The default input for the group.
